sentences.cn: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.en: A police car pulled up alongside us.
sentences.cn: 一辆警车在我们旁边停了下来。

sentences.en: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.
sentences.cn: 各种重工业沿着港口逐渐发展起来。

sentences.en: Alongside of him stood his uncle.
Alongside the Job Creation Programme they launched a Work Experience Programme.
sentences.cn: 在开展创造就业项目的同时，他们还启动了工作经历项目。

sentences.en: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.cn: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。
辛迪把她的快艇系在旁边。

sentences.en: He crossed the street and walked alongside Central Park.
sentences.cn: 他过了马路，然后在中央公园旁边走着。

sentences.en: He had worked alongside Frank and Mark and they had become friends.
sentences.cn: 他与弗兰克和马克一起工作过，并且成了朋友。

sentences.en: He waited several minutes for a car to pull up alongside.
sentences.cn: 他等了几分钟，直到一辆汽车靠边停下。

sentences.en: Her self-confidence will develop alongside her technique.
sentences.cn: 随着她的技术不断提高，她会愈发自信。

sentences.en: It's a pleasure to work alongside such men.
sentences.cn: 与这样的人一起工作是一件乐事.

sentences.en: Men aged 60 are fighting alongside young boys.
sentences.cn: 年届六十的男人们和少年小伙们并肩作战。

sentences.en: She's going to pull up alongside us.
The boat drew alongside the bank.
The two ships lay alongside of each other.
There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre.
We use the whiteboards alongside one of the walls, where you just write down your name if you have a question.
sentences.cn: 用其中一面墙壁旁边的白色书写板，如果有问题，你只要在那里写下你的名字。

trans.tran_en: next to the side of something
next to the side of something

trans.tran_cn: 在…旁边，沿着…的边，与…一起/同时
trans.tran_en: next to the side of something
